favourites.noSubscription:

email.text: If you wish to share your own tips or otherwise wishes to reach us, you can click the button and send us an email.

vinegar.title: Vinegar
vinegar.description: Vinegar is an acid that removes bad odors and is good to have on hand.

bakingSoda.title: Baking soda
bakingSoda.description: Mix with an acid (vinegar, citric or ascorbic acid) for an effective cleaner or use instead of yeast when baking.

salt.title: Salt
salt.description: The most important spice! Can be used to scrub tough stains. Ferment vegetables with salt and water.

lemon.title: Lemon
lemon.description: Lemon gives the homemade cleaner a fresh smell. Lemon water is good for digestion.
